price: بۇ شۇنىڭ ئۈچۈندۇركى، ئاللاھ مۆمىنلەرنىڭ مەدەتكارىدۇر، كاپىرلارغا مەدەتكار يوقتۇر[11].
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
